metadata.title: CVE-2020-6070 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the file systemchecking functionality of fsck.f2fs 1.12.0. A specially crafted f2fs filecan cause a logic flaw and out-of-bounds heap operations, resulting in codeexecution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
